description: Product and Process Design Group (GDPP) at the University of the Andes focuses on enhancing sustainability in food systems through qualitative research and innovative projects. It aims to explore the intersection of sound, music, and consumer perception of sustainability, particularly in food contexts. By conducting field experiments and collaborating with various stakeholders, the initiative seeks to improve the public's understanding and appreciation of sustainable practices, ultimately contributing to a more sustainable food transition.
name: GDPP Universidad de los Andes
